cleaned_text: Rose Crystal Diffuser Sale price Price $69.00 Regular price Unit price per [Shipping](/policies/shipping-policy)calculated at checkout. Heart 100% Natural hand picked raw Rose Quartz crystals comes with 2 bottles of Essential Oils. Known as the crystal of Unconditional Love, Rose Quartz carries a soft feminine energy of compassion and peace, strengthening relationship bonds. Enjoy the benefits of pairing aromatherapy with crystal energy. Best placed in a small room - bedroom, study room. How to use: Add 10-15 drops of essential oil over the raw crystals. The scent will last for a few days. Our pure Essential Oils are GMO-free and are used in aromatherapy. For all other uses, carefully dilute with a carrier oil such as jojoba or almond oil. Pure Essential Oils are highly concentrated and should be used with care. Precautions Do not ingest. For external use only. Keep out of reach from children. Avoid contact with eyes. If pregnant or lactating, consult your practitioner before using.
